title: Democracy in America - second paragraph function

content.prompt: The primary function of the second paragraph is to

choices.label: caution the reader that statements in the first paragraph may be misleading
recapitulate ideas in the first paragraph and provide a transition to the third paragraph
shift the focus from personal experience to objective analysis
expand the generalizations introduced in paragraph one to include various other forms of government

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
